title: Can't buy new champ with ip
body: I have the ip to buy the new champ, but when I go to the store I am told that I don't have the ip for the purchase.

replies.body: It looks like the champion was already unlocked!  Let me know if this is still an issue.
Also don't tell me to open the legacy client, as that doesn't do anything but close my client. Nothing happens when I click the legacy client.
